content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (41.0,-86.0)
- Storage chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Storage chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5)
- Output storage chest at (-24.5,-58.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Burner inserter at (-6.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), and (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), and (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles network at (7.5,20.5), (11.5,20.5), (10.5,12.5), (7.5,13.5)

### Research Lab
- Single lab with automation science pack input

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Ensure required items are available before starting refueling operations

### Errors with chest capacity
- Monitor chest capacity and empty full chests to prevent blockages
- The chest at (-5.5,-55.5) is full and blocking the mining operation

### Errors with fluid systems
- Steam engine has no input liquid and no fluid connections
- Ensure proper pipe connections between water source, boiler, and steam engine

### Errors with fuel management
- Boiler and multiple mining drills are out of fuel
- Implement regular refueling system to keep critical infrastructure operational
- Keep coal mining and distribution system operational to prevent cascading fuel shortages
